mapper.select:
SELECT acc_app_login_log.id, acc_app_login_log.platform, acc_app_login_log.user_code, acc_app_login_log.user_name, def_store.store_code, def_store.brand_code, acc_app_login_log.store_name, acc_app_login_log.position, acc_app_login_log.phone, acc_app_login_log.corp_code, def_corp.corp_name, acc_app_login_log.time, acc_app_login_log.created_date, def_user.isactive user_isactive, def_user.can_login user_can_login FROM acc_app_login_log,def_corp,def_user,def_store WHERE acc_app_login_log.corp_code=def_corp.corp_code AND acc_app_login_log.corp_code=def_user.corp_code AND acc_app_login_log.user_code=def_user.user_code AND acc_app_login_log.store_name=def_store.store_name
AND acc_app_login_log.corp_code = #{corp_code}
AND ( acc_app_login_log.platform LIKE concat('%', #{search_value},'%') OR acc_app_login_log.user_name LIKE concat('%', #{search_value},'%') OR def_corp.corp_name LIKE concat('%', #{search_value},'%') )
GROUP BY acc_app_login_log.id ORDER BY acc_app_login_log.id DESC
